name: TWR Africa
description: Trans World Radio broadcasts the Gospel of Jesus Christ to more than 40 countries in Africa in more than 60 languages and dialects. Listen to Mid Morning Coffee Break, Leading the Way English, as well as programs such as The Hour of Decision, among others.

name: Jelele
description: Jelele your number 1 radio station from The Kingdom of eSwatini (Swaziland). Tune in to enjoy the most entertaining and educative content from The kingdom of eSwatini (Swaziland)

name: Hala Radio
description: Hala Radio - HALA means the aura of a light around the moon, we bring you a brand new dawn of Africa. Radio hosts brings an eclectic mix of shows, but they are each extremely vibrant and well-curated, making it an excellent place to find something new.

name: WillyBamz Top Stereo
description:
Willybamz Top Stereo is an online radio based in Africa and caters for different cultures and all ages worldwide via web streaming.

We deliver local and international news entertainment
We looking to inspire and  capture the hearts of our listeners through content that will have them interact with us from all over the Globe!
#TheWillToShine
